DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , open-label , randomize crossover study conduct three cohort healthy adult subject . Approximately 36 subject randomize one three cohort ( approximately 12 subject per cohort ) receive single dose E2006 capsule formulation single dose E2006 tablet formulation , random sequence , 1:1 ratio . The dos test 2.5 mg , 10 mg , 25 mg .
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label Study Bioavailability E2006 Tablet Versus Capsule Formulations
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Healthy male female , age 18 55 year Body mass index ( BMI ) & gt ; 18 32 kg/m2 Screening Exclusion : Female subject nursing Subjects history gastrointestinal surgery ( hepatectomy , nephrectomy , digestive organ resection , etc . ) may affect PK profile E2006 Subjects know history clinically significant drug food allergy Subjects know allergy hypersensitivity capsule tablet ingredient
